title: Kadugalavu Lyrics Kadugu
stanzas:
Size-il andha vaanam perusu
kanna moodikitta sirusaagum
size-il indha vazhka sirusu
kanna moodumvara perusaagum

malaichaa unaku malaithaan
uli eduthaa adhuvum silaithan
ilai nuniyil paniye azhagu
adhukullaiyum adangum ulagu.

aiyyaiyyo boomikku
nee oru kadugu
aiyyaiyyo saamikku
boomiye kadugu

Size-il andha vaanam perusu
kanna moodikitta sirusaagum
size-il indha vazhka sirusu
kanna moodumvara perusaagum

thudi thudikkuthu nenju
adhukulla oru kanava thaekki
pada padakkura rekka
adha virichu
puthu boomiya nokki
paraparakkira kaaththil
puriyaama oru panjapola
adu aduththathu enna
theriyaama nee payanam pora.

sogam ellam persuthaan
sirikka therinjaa ellaam
kadugalavu
sirikka therinjaa ellaam
kadugalavu

Size-il andha vaanam perusu
kanna moodikitta sirusaagum
size-il indha vazhka sirusu
kanna moodumvara perusaagum

malaichaa unaku malaithaan
uli eduthaa adhuvum silaithaan
ilai nuniyil paniye azhagu
adhukullaiyum adangum ulagu.

aiyyaiyyo boomikku
nee oru kadugu
aiyyaiyyo saamikku
boomiye kadugu

seo.title: Kadugalavu Lyrics Kadugu
seo.description: Get the complete Kadugalavu Lyrics Kadugu from Kadugu. Read the lyrics penned by Karky and composed by SN Arunagiri and sung by Haricharan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Karky, Kadugu, SN Arunagiri, Haricharan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
